sql.if: where userid in ( select userid from member2 where writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or userid in (select userid from member2 where writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )

mapper.insert: insert into hugiboard(userid, writer, title, content, filename, filepath) values (#{userid}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update hugiboard set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
update hugiboard set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, filename=#{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filepath=#{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into hugi_comments(content, userid, pid) values (#{content}, #{userid}, #{pid})
mapper.select: select c.*, (select writer from member2 where userid = c.userid) writer, to_char(writedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') writedate from hugi_comments c where pid=#{pid} order by id desc
mapper.update: update hugi_comments set content=#{content} where id=#{id}
